column1: She went to the shop to get some oranges but they had none.
The cat sat in the tree ready to pounce on the ducks below.
Aaron proudly rolled up his pants leg and showed that scar.
A owl is waiting for the perfect moment to catch its prey with its claws.
Tom dustted off his tennis racket before the next round,
John boils a kettle and pours it in to make the water very hot.
